tool_description: Supply a search term, date, location to search our database of Tweets, get back  sentiment data for that search term.  This API does not return any Tweets
name: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: twitter_sentiment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-sentiment-analysis2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
